markdown: PROGRAMME **International Medical Advisory Conference** *The Regent of Sydney, 199 George Street, Sydney* FRIDAY, 7th OCTOBER SESSION VI BUSINESS SESSION (Association Delegates Only) *Chairman*: Professor B. MacMahon 13.45 Drink-driving; Legislative Trends and Association Attitudes Australia: Mr. H. S. Bingham Canada: Mr. K. R. Lavery United States of America: Mr. H. B. King United Kingdom: Mr. G.
